text.jpText:
チームの士気は、練習試合の善戦によって
ハッキリと上がっていた。
text.enText:
The morale of the team had clearly 
been boosted by the good showing 
in the practice matches.

text.jpText:
偵察に来たチーム＜ファースト＞の2人は、
樫本代理に言われたことをこなすだけでは、
やがて負けると危惧する。
text.enText:
The two members of Team First, who had come 
to scout the area, feared that if they did 
only what Deputy Kashimoto told them to do, 
they would soon lose the game. they fear that 
they will eventually lose.

text.jpText:
向こうが友情のためなら、
こっちは樫本代理のために――
text.enText:
If she's doing it for friendship, I'm doing 
it for Deputy Kashimoto.

text.jpText:
計画外のトレーニングをする
チーム＜ファースト＞のメンバーを、
樫本代理は偶然見かけたのだった。
text.enText:
Deputy Kashimoto happened to see a member of 
Team First doing some unplanned training. 
Deputy Kashimoto happened to see a member of 
Team First training for an unplanned
